item.title: Trump adviser Alex Bruesewitz collapses on stage during speech at New York Young Republican Club gala
item.description: An adviser to President-elect Trump's campaign, Alex Bruesewitz, fainted as he was speaking during a New York Young Republican Club gala Sunday night.
